comments.body: This code can do many things. Please see my above comment. (https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/32184#issuecomment-820459844)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +78,82 @@      fileData = schedulerAllocFile.map { f =>
        val filePath = new Path(f)
        val fis = filePath.getFileSystem(sc.hadoopConfiguration).open(filePath)
        logInfo(s"Creating Fair Scheduler pools from $f")
        Some((fis, f))
